P

peer - Variable in class controller.Client
Peer thread for all incoming messages from the Server.
peer - Variable in class controller.ClientHandler
Peer thread for all incoming messages from the Client.
Peer - Class in controller
Peer for recieving messages.
Peer(ClientHandler) - Constructor for class controller.Peer
Creates a peer object for a ClientHandler.
Peer(Client) - Constructor for class controller.Peer
Creates a peer object for a Client.
peerSetup() - Method in class controller.Client
Sets up a peer for incoming messages.
play() - Method in class controller.LocalGame
Plays the Connect Four game.
player - Variable in class controller.Client
Player for knowing if the client plays as a human player of a computer player.
Player - Class in model
Abstract class for a player in Connect Four.
Player(String, Mark) - Constructor for class model.Player
Creates a new Player object.
playernumber - Variable in class controller.ClientHandler
The player number the client plays with.
players - Variable in class controller.LocalGame
The 2 players of the game.
playGame() - Static method in class view.ConnectFour
Lets the user choose if he / she wants to play a local game or a multiplayer game.
playLocal() - Static method in class view.ConnectFour
Starts a local game.
playMulti() - Static method in class view.ConnectFour
Starts a Client to play a multiplayer game.
printError(String) - Method in class controller.Client
Prints an error from the Server on the Standard Output.
printError(String) - Method in class controller.ClientHandler
Prints an error message to the server's view.
printGameEnd(String) - Method in class view.ClientView
When a game ends, prints the name of the winner, if there is one.
printLobby(String) - Method in class view.ClientView
Prints the current lobby of the server.
printResult() - Method in class controller.LocalGame
Prints the result of the last game.
printString(String) - Method in class view.ClientView
Prints an arbitrary String.
printString(String) - Method in class view.ServerView
Prints an arbitrary and beautiful string.
